definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
7th earthly branch: 11 a.m.-1 p.m., noon, 5th solar month (6th June-6th July), year of the Horse/ancient Chinese compass point: 180° (south)
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

pinyin: Ge2 lin2 ni2 zhi4 ben3 chu1 zi3 wu3 xian4

sentences.english: So, the Greenwich Meridian would be here, now, the one on the x axis.
sentences.chinese: 因此本初子午線應該在這裏，也就是x軸。

sentences.english: Once again, it's important to note that this occurred at the Greenwich meridian.
sentences.chinese: 再說一遍，記住這發生在本初子午線很重要。
